intro: Arachnothryx leptodictya, commonly known as the slender-leafed arachnothryx, is a tropical climbing plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is native to regions of South America, particularly Brazil, and thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant features opposite, simple leaves that are usually elliptical or ovate in shape. Its flowers are small and clustered, typically white or pale yellow, and are borne in terminal inflorescences. The fruit is a capsule that splits open to release small, dry seeds.
